name: MarbleSphere
description:
You are a black sphere on top of a mountain. White spheres are your enemies, and they will try to push you off the edge.

Your goal is to push the white spheres off the arena without falling.

As the game progresses, enemies get tougher. There are 3 levels with 16 waves each. How long can you survive?

Tips:

  • At the start of the game, try to stay close to the edge and make enemies fall down
  • When you get the power-up (lightning icon), crash into as many enemies as possible to send them flying away!

Controls

  • WASD, Arrow keys or Left Stick: Move
  • Q/E or Ctrl/Space: Rotate Camera
  • Click the Pause button (top right corner) to pause the game

Game concept from Unity's Create With Code course. I made some changes to the controls and added different enemy types.
